field.comment: You must enable CPF/CPNJ for only Brazil as billing country

field.label: Enable Instalment
field.comment: If set to "Yes", This will enable shopper to select installment before making their payment for Latin America country only.

field.label: Instalment Configuration
field.comment:
The following are the Instalment types:
  • Type1-Up to 12 instalment is applicable to AR and BR.
  • Type2-Up to 18 instalment in sequence: 3; 6; 9; 10; 12; 15 is applicable to MX.
  • Type3-Up to 36 instalments in sequence: 3; 6; 9; 10; 12; 18; 24; 36; is applicable to CO.
  • Type4-Up to 48 instalments in sequence: 3; 6; 9; 10; 12; 18; 24; 36; 48: is applicable to BZ,CL,CR,SV,GT,HN,NI,PA,PE.

field.label: Enable Exemption Engine
field.comment: If set to Yes, transactions may be exempted from SCA, based on real-time risk analysis.

field.label: Exemption Placement
field.comment: Optimised applies the exemption placement that has the highest probability of issuer acceptance as determined by the Exemption Engine.

field.label: Exemption Types
field.comment: OP has the highest probability of issuer acceptance determined by the Exemption Engine.

field.label: Partial Capture
field.comment: You must disable "Auto Invoice" under "General Configuration" to make partial capture work.

field.label: Time window
field.comment: Orders placed within the entered hours will be considered for synchronization.

field.label: Subscriptions Enabled
field.comment: Before enabling, make sure you connect with Worldpay contact.

field.label: Recurring Order Reminder Email
field.comment: Will be send 10 days before buffer time

field.label: Country Codes
field.comment: Note: Map the refused country code with accepted country code. e.g. JE-GB, JE (Jersey) is refused country code by worldpay and it is mapped to GB (Great Britain).

field.label: Global Currency Exponent
field.comment: Note: As per ISO guidelines Worldpay accepts only 0,2 and 3 as exponent values.

field.label: Override Global Currency Exponent
field.comment: Note: Enabling this option allows you to override the global currency exponent for a particular currency code using the below grid.

field.label: Currency Code Exponents
